thread.title: Carl’s Jr. Cooks Up a New York Expansion

author: Charles Passy
title: Carl’s Jr. Cooks Up a New York Expansion

locations.name: new york expansion new york city

text:
New York City has given the world all manner of burgers. But Carl’s Jr. is betting it can beef up the city’s offerings.
The fast-food chain, operated by Tennessee-based CKE Restaurant Holdings, Inc., is opening its first Manhattan location this week, bringing its signature menu items, such as the Western Bacon Cheeseburger, to midtown.
The...
